review: I love it, easy to install and the content is great. I have 3 Tivos and Netflix always seemed clunky but after using it with the Fire I realize the problem was with TiVo not Netflix. I intend to purchase another Fire.
author: Kathleen Casey

review: I am pleased with the purchase of Fire TV. It was extremely easy to set up and is simple to use. I only wish it offered more shows. Between Amazon Fire, Netflix and Sling there are plenty of things to watch. I had my satellite turned off and don't miss it at all.
author: Darrell Alldredge

review: I had problems with my Fire TV out of the box.  I contacted Tech Support and got an immediate phone call. Within 15 minutes they walked me through the solution.  This level of service is on par with Apple Care support.  I'm delighted with the performance, price and support!
author: Chester J Flynn
